ygData.subject: RE: Scribing spells.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Can not even scribe them until you are the proper level. But you can buy them, hold on to them, carry them where ever you go and dream of the day that you can
ygData.messageBody:
Can not even scribe them until you are the proper level. But you can buy
them, hold on to them, carry them where ever you go and dream of the day
that you can plop down while the rest of your part is in battle and
scribe your spells into your book.

-----Original Message-----
From: Phil Showalter [mailto:phil@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 11:40 AM
To: eqdruids@onelist.com
Cc: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Scribing spells.....


From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>

Don't know why I've never tried this (guess I didn't want to take a
chance),
but can you buy and scribe spells higher than your level, but just can't
mem
them? Or can you not even scribe them? Thanx for your help......
